attributes.action: Stop the jargon talk "hard working families".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the phrase "hard working families".
Gordon Brown is the worst offender of using the above phrase.
This discrimates against single people and childless couples who are hard working but do not fit the 2.2 family statistic.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
